shapes.label: Article
shapes.comment: An article, such as a news article or piece of investigative report. Newspapers and magazines have articles of many different types and this is intended to cover them all.\\n\\nSee also [blog post](http://blog.schema.org/2014/09/schemaorg-support-for-bibliographic_2.html).

property.name: articleBody
property.description: The actual body of the article.

property.name: pageEnd
property.description: The page on which the work ends; for example \"138\" or \"xvi\".

property.name: pageStart
property.description: The page on which the work starts; for example \"135\" or \"xiii\"
